channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins CloudBees CD Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins CloudBees CD Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21647|2024-08-03T18:16:23.705Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cloudbees%20cd%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins CloudBees CD Plugin 1.1.21 and earlier does not perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Item/Read permission to schedule builds of projects without having Item/Build permission.
